IRC chat on Freenode:.
The gentoo developers and helpers run the following channels for mutual benefit, it is purely voluntary, and open to everyone. feel free to pop in and say hello.
General Channels
Channel Name Description
#gentoo General Discussion
#gentoo-ppc Gentoo Linux/PPC
#gentoo-sparc Gentoo Linux/Sparc
#gentoo-user Low-bandwidth chat
#gentoo-server Server related chat
